document.full_text: toshiba corp is the latest company to jump into the rapidly growing tablet market with a 10-inch device called thrive, priced slightly lower than apple inc's dominant ipad 2.
document.title: toshiba's thrive tablet to go on sale in july
lines_and_colors: toshiba corp is the latest company to jump into the rapidly growing tablet market with a 10-inch device called thrive, priced slightly lower than apple inc's dominant ipad 2.
